description: a(n) = least k such that if 1<=h<=n then T(n,k)>=T(n,h), T given by A008284.
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = 1, mk = mx = 0}, While[k < n + 1, a = Length@ IntegerPartitions[n, {k}]; If[a > mx, mx = a; mk = k]; k++ ]; mk]; Array[f, 85] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 20 2010 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jul 20 2010
